name: PAN OCEANIC 46
notes:
Originally the OCEANIC 46. (Robert Pancoe orginally supervised contructon in Taiwan)   Another version is called the SEASTAR 460, although built by a different yard (after 1982) is nearly the same boat. Other names include MAO TA 46, and generically, BREWER 46. (though it was never actually sold as a BREWER 46.)
Thanks to Ted Brewer for providing updated information and images. 
Plans available from his website.
